carouselCards.title: Hey it's me!
carouselCards.description: Glad you're here nice to meet you 👋

carouselCards.title: My last track day
carouselCards.description: This was my last track day at HPR. I got a new personal best of 2 minutes flat. That's not too bad 🏍️

carouselCards.title: A recent favorite photograph
carouselCards.description: One of my favorite captures to date, because of the patience it took 📸.

carouselCards.title: My current painting
carouselCards.description: This is my latest painting. Follow me on other platforms to watch me finish it 🎨
